author: David Pasztor
title: WATCH: Joe Cole tips Chelsea for the title, Hazard for best ever in wonderful Chelsea Fan TV interview

organizations.name: chelsea fan tv interview rec  chelsea fan tv

text:
Rec 
Chelsea Fan TV is a sort of new player on the Chelsea YouTube scene â€” the channel itself is new after a shake-up and reformat ended the old Chelsea Fans Channel as we knew it, but the presenters and personalities are mostly the same as before. The content is largely the same as well, but this exclusive interview with Chelsea favorite Joe Cole is a step above the usual fare. Several steps, probably, as it's quite wonderful. 
It's a little over 15 minutes long, but it's well worth your time. 
Joey talks a bit about his time training at Cobham recently while preparing for the new USL season with the Tampa Bay Rowdies, about his impressions of Conte, his high hopes for Chelsea this season and Eden Hazard (with whom he played for a season at Lille) in particular (best ever at Chelsea?), and his own future in coaching. 
Then, in the bit more informal second part of the interview, he tells a couple funny stories of being late and hungover for his first Chelsea trophy parade, playing pranks in the dressing room, and celebrating his goal against Manchester United in the FA Cup. 
And then there are of course all the stories of Billy, the legend. 
Anyway, gotta love Joey Cole! Great stuff. More From We Ain't Got No History
